name: Dodge (itch) (ShiftKun)
description:
Thank you so much for playing my game

This game was made a long time ago. Decided to publish it onto here!

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEYS = Movement

J = Jump

Credits:

- Shifat Khan: Programmer / Music composer

- William Ngo: Programmer / Artist

Special Thanks:

I lost the bookmarks to the assets used since this project is pretty old. They were all free, but needed to be credited. If you find the link to it, please inform me in the comments section.
